question: As per the recent Renewables Global Status Report, which country is the largest producer of biofuels in the world?
explanation: The report is released by the Renewable Energy Policy Network for the 21st Century. As per the recent report, Global production of biofuels was dominated by the United States and Brazil – these two countries produce 72% of all biofuels – followed by Germany, Argentina and Indonesia. United States is the largest producer of biofuels in the world.
